Sentencas: A right-angular configuration for the single-chamber solid oxide fuel cell (SC-SOFC) has been proposed and operated successfully in a methane-oxygen mixture (CH4:O-2 = 2:1) with a total flow rate of 300 mL min(-1).
Titulo: A right-angular configuration for the single-chamber solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: It was fabricated by attaching the Ni/yttria-stabilized zirconia (YSZ) anode and the Sm0.2Ce0.8O1.9-impregnated La0.7Sr0.3MnO3 (LSM) cathode on two mutually perpendicular planes of a YSZ electrolyte substrate.
Titulo: A right-angular configuration for the single-chamber solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: Effect of the relative position of the electrodes on the ohmic resistance has been investigated.
Titulo: A right-angular configuration for the single-chamber solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: It is shown that the cell exhibits the smallest ohmic resistance when the two electrodes are symmetrically located on the two planes.
Titulo: A right-angular configuration for the single-chamber solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: Compared with the conventional coplanar SC-SOFC, this configuration can make full use of the edge area of the electrolyte substrate and shorten the conductive channel of oxygen ion, leading to a remarkable reduction in ohmic resistance, an elevation of the open-circuit voltage, and, ultimately, an improved performance.
Titulo: A right-angular configuration for the single-chamber solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: The simple stack, consisting of two right-angular cells connected in series on an electrolyte, generated an open-circuit voltage 1.4 V at 700 degrees C and a maximum power 14.9 mW at 800 degrees C. (C) 2010 Professor T. Nejat Veziroglu.
Titulo: A right-angular configuration for the single-chamber solid oxide fuel cell
